item.title: Gadwal Handloom Artist Selected For Prestigious Milan Festival In Italy
item.description:
<![CDATA[ETV Bharat / state
Gadwal Handloom Artist Selected For Prestigious Milan Festival In Italy
Jogulamba Gadwal: Telangana is renowned for its folk arts and crafts, particularly the handloom industry. This vibrant sector has garnered numerous accolades both nationally and internationally.
G. Vijay Rajendravarman, a renowned handloom artist from Telangana's Jogulamba Gadwal district, has been selected to participate in the internationally acclaimed ‘Milan Festival’ to be held in Italy from Decembe...]]>
item.author: Etv Bharat
